Hard worker with experience in web development. A goal-oriented focused person who pays attention to details and never stops learning new things and improving already existing skills.
I am actively looking for opportunities and exciting challenges!

aboutAlternative.text:
Hard worker with experience in web development. A goal-oriented focused person who pays attention to details and never stops learning new things and improving already existing skills.
I am actively looking for opportunities and exciting challenges!

positions.title: Co-Founder
positions.description:
Kowainik is a small team of enthusiasts who use Haskell and other functional technologies to develop more reliable libraries and tools. We enjoy creating our projects, and we want everybody to enjoy using them.

In our team, we have developers with 5+ years of Haskell production experience, people skilled in Elm, Kotlin, PostgreSQL any many other technologies.

What we do:
• Developing and maintaining more than 20 open-source production-level libraries which are used in free and commercial projects
• Providing Haskell mentorship for beginners
• Helping with learning materials
• Consulting about best-practices and Haskell projects architecture
…
see more

positions.title: IT Support Assistant

positions.title: Python Web-Developer

Interaction with various departments and management requirements and flow of work

positions.title: Results Technology Specialist
positions.description:
Working as a Technology Specialist at the New Volleyball Venue for Volleyball competitions within Tbilisi 2015 European Youth Olympic Festival.
Main responsibilities: analyzing and recording the match statistics, using the international statistics program OVR Volleyball by ALL ONE-Sports company.
Also: observe the match closely, have solid understanding of game play and volleyball statistics, and be able to identify and communicate clearly each volleyball action that occurs throughout the game, complete data input accurately and efficiently, transcribing information into the computer system.
…
see more

positions.title: Deputy Venue Technology Manager
positions.description:
Involvement and cooperation in management of the delivery project of all technology for the largest venue of Baku 2015 European Games, Olympic Stadium, which held the Opening & Closing Ceremonies and Athletics competition and Athletics Sport Test & Ramp-up Event for volunteers.

Responsibilities: detailed technology design for venue spaces, layout of core technology and critical spaces; determination of all function requirements, planning, implementing and operation; delivery of planned technology on venue including network cabling, Audio Visual, scoreboard requirements, Public Alarm system support; troubleshooting of all technology issues; end-users support; managing/reporting/solving technology incidents, Microsoft Service Manager usage; managing venue technology team: communication and cooperation with technology contractors (EuroDesign, Azercell, Azerphone etc.), managing team of 8 technology volunteers; communications and working with other functions;
…
see more
